rules_text: Whenever Echo of Family attacks, you may pay {1{U}B} and sacrifice a nontoken enchantment you control. If you do draw a card, then create a Murmur token. [i](It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with “{2I},{3I}– Add {C}.”)[/i]
notes: Watch the murmur clause? Do I want it to be able to recycle the murmurs
